issue.title: com.wbd.stream
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wbd.stream

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

||prod-dtc-android-open-measurement.mercury.dnit
v.com^

shows when playing videos

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://ya.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fya.ru%2F) ### Comment > Здравствуйте, с включённый adguard сайт яндекса не реагирует ни на одно нажатие мышки в браузере microsoft edge, в других браузерах данной проблемы нету. ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.bilibili.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

pull_request.title: Fix #197091 eromanga-ace.com
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/197091

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

Expired domain.

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/408aeddb-7629-49f3-80e5-42815018bdaf)

</details>

<details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: new google ad domain
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker, Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

n/a

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

found this: ogads-pa.clients6.google.com in my dns logs. right now we have ogads-pa.googleapis.com in the list. i think we should add the one i found too?

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Not really sure, Google recommends not blocking the domain: `https://support.google.com/a/answer/15627649` and I can't find actual usage.

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/196995#issuecomment-2614202407
Fixed a few hours ago. Please update filters in 1-2 hours and check again. If you still see the ads, try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update. Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will break configuration process.

issue.title: analytics.pinterest.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://analytics.pinterest.com/overview/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fanalytics.pinterest.com%2Foverview%2F) ### Comment > When the AdGuard browser extension is enabled, I am unable to access https://analytics.pinterest.com/. However, I don't face any issues accessing https://pinterest.com/. I tried disabling the browser extension and even turned off protection from the AdGuard desktop app, but the page still wouldn't load. Strangely, the issue disappears only after I completely uninstall the AdGuard software, allowing me to access the website without any problems. > > Please note that this doesn't seem to be related to the browser extension itself. I tested it on Firefox, where the AdGuard extension isn't installed, and I still couldn't access the page. > > Could you kindly guide me on how to access https://analytics.pinterest.com/ without having to uninstall AdGuard? Your help would be greatly appreciated. Username: `@shekhor-bd` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/k9h6ss984hwgokkgcw0wosk0g880sw03hel46pfhq0.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/bb9rwusr9nsosk8g0k4ow0sg4gsogksftrdc6w5ee8.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.4.49 MV2 System version: | Windows 11 Browser: | Edge Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Other extensions used: | Eset

comment.body: @Alex-302 , I am not quite sure whether I am using the AdGuard DNS. But turning off the desktop app solves the issue on Firefox. Please take note, the AdGuard extension is not installed in Firefox.
